rules: Rule1: The recipe has premium oil as an ingredient or the kitchen produces high quality dish
Rule2: If the cook achieves consistent results, then the kitchen produces high quality dish
Rule3: If the cook receives training in advanced techniques, then should the cook follow standard recipe procedure, the cook achieves consistent results
Rule4: The cook receives training in advanced techniques or the cook learns from a senior chef mentor
Rule5: The customer complains about the dish or the dish does not fail quality check
Rule6: If the kitchen passes health inspection, then the kitchen maintains standards or should the recipe not have substitute oil as an ingredient, the recipe needs adjustment
Rule7: If the kitchen implements safety protocols, then the kitchen passes health inspection
Rule8: If the kitchen follows cleaning schedule, then the kitchen passes health inspection
Rule9: If the health inspector visits the kitchen, then the kitchen implements safety protocols or the kitchen follows cleaning schedule
Rule10: The health inspector visits the kitchen or the owner conducts audit of the kitchen
Rule11: If the recipe has substitute oil as an ingredient, then the recipe does not have premium oil as an ingredient
Rule12: If the owner conducts audit of the kitchen, then the kitchen implements safety protocols or the kitchen follows cleaning schedule
Rule13: Ingredient shortage occurs in the supply chain or the supplier delays delivery of ingredients
Rule14: If the supplier delays delivery of ingredients, then provided that the recipe does not have substitute oil as an ingredient, the recipe requires adaptation

Rule15: If the head chef approves alternative approach, then the kitchen implements alternative for the recipe or should ingredient shortage occur in the supply chain, if the recipe does not have substitute oil as an ingredient, the recipe requires adaptation
Rule16: The customer receives positive review or quality control does not fail for the dish
Rule17: If the kitchen earns culinary award, then the customer does not receive positive review
Rule18: If the chef approves modification of the recipe, then the recipe needs adjustment
Rule19: If the manager authorizes equipment upgrade, then the cook has a backup plan or should the cook use specialty pan equipment, the kitchen produces high quality dish
Rule20: The manager authorizes equipment upgrade or the supervisor approves equipment upgrade
Rule21: If the supervisor approves equipment upgrade, then the cook has a backup plan or provided that the cook uses specialty pan equipment, the kitchen produces high quality dish
Rule22: If it is not the case that learning from a senior chef mentor leads to the cook achieving consistent results when following standard recipe procedure, then the dish fails quality check

Rule23: If it is not the case that attending workshop on recipe optimization results in the cook achieving consistent results when learning from a senior chef mentor and following standard recipe procedure, then quality control fails for the dish
Rule24: If following standard recipe procedure does not result in the cook achieving consistent results, then the procedure does not deviate from standard recipe

Rule25: If the failure of following standard recipe procedure to achieve consistent results does not lead to procedure deviation from standard recipe, then innovation leads to improvement of the recipe

Rule26: If the failure of following standard recipe procedure to achieve consistent results does not result in procedure deviation from standard recipe, then innovation does not lead to improvement of the recipe
Rule27: If the recipe does not have substitute oil as an ingredient, then the chef approves modification of the recipe
facts: Fact1: The head chef approves alternative approach
Fact2: The cook attends workshop on recipe optimization
Fact3: The kitchen earns culinary award
Fact4: The cook uses specialty pan equipment
Fact5: The cook follows standard recipe procedure
Fact6: The customer does not complain about the dish
Fact7: The kitchen does not maintain standards
Fact8: The recipe does not require adaptation
Fact9: The kitchen does not implement alternative for the recipe
Fact10: The recipe does not need adjustment
Fact11: The cook does not have a backup plan

question: The kitchen produces high quality dish
